formalText: We need to talk more about his medication.
He has still not been feeling great.
At a Sci-Fi convention this weekend, he got very anxious
He was also feeling pretty frustrated
His medication might make him irritated .
He was wondering if he should just stop going to conventions this big because he might be feeling more irritated and more depressed  because of medication
Talked a bit about his African American studies and literature experience.
He feels like he may have Benn super critical of himself because he was mad.
The convention was really intensely noisy and aggravating in that like there were lots of people in various costumes, which is usually very fun to him.
but he was getting frustrated at people with big costumes  walking in into the aisle and whacking into him
He was really frustrated by the crowds
